explains: n. 小茴香；莳萝；孜然芹

sentences.en: 2 teaspoons lightly toasted cumin seeds, ground.
Use less salt and more pepper, chili, cinnamon, cumin or curry.
sentences.cn: 少放点盐，多放点胡椒、辣椒，桂皮、孜然或咖喱。

sentences.en: Add onion, garlic, cumin, chili powder, cocoa, salt and pepper to pan. Stir to combine.
sentences.cn: 平底锅加入少量油，油热后放入碎洋葱块、蒜末、孜然粉、辣椒面、可可粉、盐和黑胡椒粉翻炒至有香味出来，加水烧至洋葱变软，大概需要5分钟左右的时间。
